article_title: Cartoons show the lighter side of healthcare payment
article_text:
Consultant and healthcare platform provider McKesson decided to have a little fun ahead of last week's America's Health Insurance Plans Institute meeting in Nashville, releasing a laughable stack of editorial cartoons poking fun at the relationship between payers and providers, ICD-10 and other topics for insiders. Advance the gallery to see each cartoon.

McKesson made these available under a Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License. Based on a work at mhsdialogue.com. Permissions beyond the scope of this license may be available at mhsdialogue.com.
